name: FISh-APT Extended
description: A feature that wraps around fish-apt-get and fish-persistent-data features, and also sets FISh as the default shell in a VSCode-based devcontainer environment and installs some other extras for FISh (Starship and FastFetch).

greeting.description: Select a special, pre-made FISh Greeting from the list - or enter your own, custom string to be used as a FISh Greeting directly.

starship.description: Install and enable Starship prompt for FISh?
